scripts.build: rimraf lib && yarn run build:js && yarn run build:ts
scripts.build:js: BABEL_ENV=build babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir lib --extensions .js,.ts,.tsx --no-comments && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json
scripts.deploy: yarn run build && npm unpublish --force --registry http://localhost:4873 @bitsy-ui/common && npm publish --registry http://localhost:4873
